plot: Monroe has a Christmas surprise for Rosalee; Trubel has a realization that impacts everyone.

Nick and Hank are called to investigate a bizarre string of home invasions that lead to an even stranger Wesen phenomenon. Monroe has a very special Christmas surprise in store for Rosalee. Meanwhile, Trubel comes to a life changing realization that will affect everyone.

Nick's powers are back just in time to investigate strange cases of people attacked at home by small ferals hidden in Christmas gifts, as turns out Kallikantzaroi, a temporary but terribly knavish 'puberty' phase -a few weeks- of otherwise harmless Wesen, who should be contained, not eliminated, with a most seasonal Saxony recipe. Josh Porter, on the run for Hundjäger, meanwhile helps Truble observe and deal with a bully pack terrorizing Bud's beaver community, gathers the courage to return and stand his ground and is joined by her.—KGF Vissers
